name: Königsberg's Escape
description:
In 1900, in the heart of the capital of Prussia called "Königsberg", you are part of a group of saboteurs of the British empire. Your mission is to escape together from the clutches of the secret police with confidential documents of the Prussian empire. Cooperate and draw your way between traffic jams, streets, boats and other surrounding elements to complete your mission while using your unique abilities.

How to play the game :

- Connect a controller to your PC

Action \ Controller
PS4XboxDashX
BUse special powerO
XConfirm ready : launch game
SquareA

You have to dash to cross  water !

You can use your special power anytime and only once per game !
